name: PacMen Exercise
description: A JavaScript project where PacMen move randomly around the screen and change direction when they hit the screen edges. It demonstrates DOM manipulation and event handling using JavaScript.

name: Eye Exercise
description: An interactive web page where the eyes follow the mouse cursor. Built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript, it demonstrates DOM manipulation and event handling in JavaScript.

name: To-do App
description: A simple to-do list app built with React. This project demonstrates the use of React components, props, and state to create an interactive user interface.

name: React Tic-Tac-Toe
description: A simple Tic-Tac-Toe game built with React. This project demonstrates the use of React components, props, and state to create an interactive user interface.

name: React Front End Banking Application
description: A front end banking application, built using React, Next.js, and Bootstrap, that allows users to create an account, and perform deposits and withdrawals. Deployed on AWS S3.

name: React Shopping Cart
description: A simple shopping cart application built with React, features item addition/removal, total price display, and Bootstrap styling. It fetches data from a Strapi API or hardcoded content, with improved UX/UI and additional features like stock alerts and restocking.
